biography: Pete Biagi is a Chicago-based working cinematographer.  He shot two films that went to the Sundance Film festival in 2002 - 'Design' & 'Stolen Summer'.  He operated camera on Robert Altmans last two films - 'The Company' & 'A Prairie Home Companion'.  To date, he has enjoyed shooting 20 feature films, many narrative shorts and many long form documentaries.
